links.title: BANK OF AMERICA: A bubble in the stock market is bursting - and its demise marks a significant regime change for investors
links.description: A bubble in low volatility that expanded a great deal in 2017 is now bursting, according to derivatives strategists at Bank of America Merrill Lynch. According to them, this marks a regime change that will change the very nature of the market as we know it today.

links.title: Trump says Kelly will leave chief of staff job at end of year
links.description: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - White House Chief of Staff John Kelly will leave his job at the end of this year, U.S. President Donald Trump said on Saturday, marking the biggest in a string of changes one month after Republicans lost control of the House of Representatives in midterm elections.
